name: Left Dex
description: Left Dex is a Challenge, and Strategy and Adventure, You are a Rectangle. W is Walking Forward and A is Walking Back There will come a point where W is Walking Backwards and A is Walking Forward, each with difficulty levels and graphics with realistic sun and shadow. and you are free to choose the phases. There Are Mechanics Ah You Go Back In Time If You Were In The Wrong Place. And you are at home near a bar and you have to catch a precious and rare thing full of dangers, you have to get into that rare thing. You Oh the only Rectangle that goes into that rare thing to see Oh what's inside.
